mapper.insert:
insert into enterprise_master_data.product_type(product_type_no, product_type_name, father_type_no, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.productTypeNo}, #{entity.productTypeName}, #{entity.fatherTypeNo}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into enterprise_master_data.product_type(product_type_no, product_type_name, father_type_no, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.productTypeNo}, #{entity.productTypeName}, #{entity.fatherTypeNo}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update product_type_no = values(product_type_no) , product_type_name = values(product_type_name) , father_type_no = values(father_type_no) , remark_info = values(remark_info) , deleted = values(deleted) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
